title: Sharp N172 Harry Stovey for sale - SGC 40
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Sharp N172 Harry Stovey for sale - SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Posted By: bcampf
Very sharp N172 Harry Stovey for sale.  SGC 40.  Name stamp on reverse.  A truly tough card to find. There wasn't one in Mastro's auction yesterday, and there isn't one in the upcoming Robert Edward Auctions or Lelands.  As nice a photo as you'll ever see.  $725.

[IMG]http://i79.photobucket.com/albums/j154/bcampf/scan0008.jpg[/IMG]
